void MsgSocketHandler::progressBegin ( int  verbosity,
const std::string &  msg,
int  total 
) [virtual]

Begin a progress reporting. After this initial call the progressStep call will be called N times where N = the parameter total passed in below.

Parameters:
verbosity - What level of verbosity is the progress associated with. Higher levels of verbosity produce more messages.
msg - String message associated with the beginning of this task.
total - Expected number of times that the progressStep() will be called after this.

Implements ProgressHandler.

void MsgSocketHandler::progressStep ( int  verbosity  )  [virtual]

This function is called when one unit of work has been done. In general it is expected that the units of work should be roughly equal in size.

Parameters:
verbosity - At what verbosity level should this step be displayed.

Implements ProgressHandler.

const std::string &  msg,
bool  delimiter = true 
) [virtual]

A message to be processed by the handler.
